updates.title: AI browser wars intensify as Microsoft launches CoPilot Mode just days after OpenAI's Atlas, signaling major platform shifts coming in November with potential Android rollouts and enhanced web AI integration.

OpenAI's Sora video platform prepares major feature expansion including pet video generation, enhanced editing tools, and Android app launch expected before year-end, positioning for broader creative market penetration.

AI assistants evolve toward persistent memory and personality as both Anthropic's Claude and Microsoft's Copilot roll out memory features, group collaboration tools, and customizable AI personas including Microsoft's new 'Mico' avatar.

Hollywood AI integration accelerates with Wonder Studios securing $12M from OpenAI and DeepMind executives to expand engineering teams and original content production, while TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 spotlights AI content strategies.

Enterprise AI infrastructure investments surge with Tensormesh raising $4.5M for 10x inference efficiency improvements and Palantir's $200M Lumen partnership, indicating November focus on AI deployment optimization for creative workflows.
